word:
Dr. Julia A. White
     DR. JULIA ANN WHITE GRADUATED FROM THE AMERICAN MEDICAL MISSIONARY COLLEGE OF CHICAGO IN 1900.  SHE WAS ASSOCIATED WITH THE BATTLE CREEK SANITARIUM UNTIL 1906, WHEN SHE WENT TO LOMA LINDA.  SHE WAS THE LEADING FOUNDER OF THE SCHOOL OF NURSING AT THE GLENDALE SANITARIUM AND HOSPITAL.  SHE ALSO FOUNDED THE LA CRESCENTA CLINIC IN CALIFORNIA.
